data.title: An automatic matching technique for patient alignment
data.meta_description: An automatic system of patient alignment is required in order to monitor changes that occur in the period between magnetic resonance scans. For each scan of the patient a prime requisite is to register the images with respect to each other. The orthogonal relationship between the sagittal and transv …
